test.doc: Check the installed packages using the "rpm -q" command against a list of expected packages, add and remove packages form the list to modify the test case. List included : ['ant', 'java-11-openjdk', 'python3', 'openssl', 'pam', 'python3-setuptools']

test.name: Verify required package are and package versions

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Get Regexp Matches
kw.doc: Returns a list of all non-overlapping matches in the given string.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

for.msg: Value of variable '&{packages_dict}' is not dictionary or dictionary-like.

test.doc: Check the versions of the packages installed meets the neccessary minimum values the test calls the packages_dict dictionary which should be populated with k,v pairs representing the required package and the minimum supported value
test.status: Value of variable '&{packages_dict}' is not dictionary or dictionary-like.

test.name: Check library availability

test.doc: Cisco NSO requires that the operating system has specific libraries installed the test verifies that the "ldconfig -p" output includes each of the libraries mentioned in the documentation. To adapt modify the list

test.name: Check libz library version

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Pass Execution
kw.arg: Major meets requirements, and Minor is greater or equal ${found_major_version[0]}.${found_minor_version[0]}
kw.doc: Skips rest of the current test, setup, or teardown with PASS status.
kw.msg: Execution passed with message: Major meets requirements, and Minor is greater or equal 1.2.11

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Found ${found_major_version[0]}.${found_minor_version[0]} this is lower than expected
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Found ${found_major_version} is greater than minimum, skipping minor check
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Pass Execution
kw.arg: Major version is greater that required , skipping minor check.
kw.doc: Skips rest of the current test, setup, or teardown with PASS status.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

test.doc: Cisco NSO requires a minimimum version of 1.2.7.1 for the libz library this test will verify that the verison installed satisfies this requirement.
test.status: Major meets requirements, and Minor is greater or equal 1.2.11

test.doc: Cisco NSO requires some utilities, this test verfies these binaries exist

test.name: Verify correct version of Python is active

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Get Regexp Matches
kw.doc: Returns a list of all non-overlapping matches in the given string.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Active Version of Python meets the minimum requirements
Active Python verison doesnt meet the requirements, review your alternatives-config to see if
correct version is active, or install the correct verison.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Pass Execution
kw.arg: Active Version of Python meets the minimum requirements
kw.doc: Skips rest of the current test, setup, or teardown with PASS status.
kw.msg: Execution passed with message: Active Version of Python meets the minimum requirements

test.doc: We require a python verison > 3.7 this test will validatre the active python environmnet meets this requirement
test.status: Active Version of Python meets the minimum requirements

test.name: Verify Hostname is not set to localhost

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Not Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are equal after converting them to strings.

test.name: Verify DNS servers are Configured

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
kw.msg: ${output} = # Generated by NetworkManager search localdomain 2 nameserver 172.16.167.2

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
kw.msg: '# Generated by NetworkManager search localdomain 2 nameserver 172.16.167.2' does not contain '192.168.1.1'

test.status: '# Generated by NetworkManager search localdomain 2 nameserver 172.16.167.2' does not contain '192.168.1.1'

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.name: Verify NTP service is active

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.doc: Check that the NTP service is active

suite.doc:
The following tests verify the operating system configuration & dependency packages are present in preperation for the Cisco NSO application testing. The checks include: - dependent packages are available - required utilities are present - hostname has been changed - DNS and NTP serviecs are configured and active
Refer to the SCDP documentation to address any failed tests.
